      • validate

        public boolean validate(String code)
        Description copied from interface: Challenge
        This is a convenience method to POST a code to an existing challenge resource in Stormpath for validation. Returns true in case the challenge is validated with the given code and false if otherwise.

        Immediate Execution: Unlike other Challenge methods, you do not need to call Saveable.save() Challenge.getStatus() method will return the submission status in the event of a failure.

        Specified by:
        validate in interface Challenge<T extends Factor,R extends Enum>
        Returns:
        true in case the challenge is validated with the given code.
